To start making mystical crops, you will need an Infusion Stone, which requires Dimensional Shards. They can be obtained, by either making a dimension in which the ore is generated or by collecting the ore from the void with a Tier 6 Void Ore Miner

Now that you have that, you can turn your Inferium Essence into the many other tiers of Essence and create all thw different resource seeds. For the next and final chapter you will want to have a farm for every non-mob and non-stone resource seed.
